|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211D; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:25:31 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.2;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.6;; |exp_if_types = USB, SATA |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = C7 |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 1A Low Dropout Regulator;Advanced Power Electronics;APE8901;;2;,,, 18V/2A Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 23V/3A Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2307DN;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;GL850G, HH1GD, 08G22, 041SR, 75931;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Arch Linux (Arm), Debian, |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2012 |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00B7NFI6K |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Internal unused SATA port. {{see also|List of Cloud Engines Devices}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[PLX Technology]]'' NAS7820 @700MHz :Dual-core ARM 11 MP *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 128MB Serial NAND Flash, 1x SATA II (internal) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 100-240V, .5A via C7 ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cloudengines/pogoplugpro ''Pogoplug Pro'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Alternate OS support=== *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/pogoplug-v2-pinkgray ''Arch Linux'' (Arm)] *[http://forum.doozan.com/read.php?3,6336 Install ''Debian'' on Pogoplug Pro] *[http://blog.qnology.com/2015/04/hacking-pogoplug-v3oxnas-proclassic.html ''Hacking the Pogoplug v3/Oxnas (Pro/Classic) with Debian''
on '''techNOLOGY''' blog] ([http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_89K8LAAGLA/VSTIw24EoBI/AAAAAAAAAgc/gZkddbRr_4o/s1600/Pogoplug%2BV3.JPG PCB images]) ====Requirements==== *[[Pogoplug B01|POGO-B01]], POGO-B02, POGO-B03, POGO-B04 (''PLX'') - '''Pogoplug Classic''' *[[Pogoplug Pro|POGO-P01]], POGO-P02 (Wi-Fi [[AzureWave AW-NE762H]]) - '''Pogoplug Pro''' *POGO-P21, POGO-P22, POGO-P24, POGO-P25 (''OxNAS'') - '''Pogoplug V3''' *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug E02|POGO-E02]] (CPU: Marvell 88F6281 @1.2GHz ''Kirkwood'') - '''Pogoplug V2''' '''Note:''' Model numbers located on bottom of foot. Please ignore the label on the box. :You can potential receive a Pogoplug V2 when buying a P21/P22. :Check the bottom of the Pogoplug's foot for correct model ! ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/cloud_engines/pogoplug_pogoplug_v3 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/cloud_engines/pogoplugpro |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=54745 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = oxnas |subtarget = ox820 |arch = arm_mpcore |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
